channel.title: nostalgia on 阿波尔的博客

item.title: clan old photos
item.description: Before I do that, let me introduce: the photos are from the 1940s, but also from the 70s and 80s. . . Photos of my dad, siblings and his elders. **==Did you know? A photo means the past of the elders, and a microcosm of that era.==**🤔 No one can stay young forever, but photos can stay. 😢 **Hope not to forget,hope always remember .**😆
